title: Rhona Ellwood
deck: I'm from the beautiful city of Edinburgh, but moved to York to marry the wonderful Caleb. I am very grateful that that move brought me into the incredible Gateway Church family! Our eldest daughter, Emma, and young twins, Micah and Maisie, keep me pretty busy, but I also work part time for a wonderful charity called Acts 435 (www.acts435.org.uk), which serves to "crowdfund" the practical needs of people in poverty.
